price: Ó máa ń dúpẹ́ àwọn ìdẹ̀ra Allāhu. Allāhu ṣà á lẹ́ṣà. Ó sì tọ́ ọ sí ọ̀nà tààrà (’Islām).
arabic: شَاكِرٗا لِّأَنۡعُمِهِۚ ٱجۡتَبَىٰهُ وَهَدَىٰهُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: shākiran li-anʿumihi ij'tabāhu wahadāhu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
